tab_infos.Name: id
tab_infos.Description: The user's Deezer ID

tab_infos.Name: name
tab_infos.Description: The user's Deezer nickname

tab_infos.Name: lastname
tab_infos.Description: The user's last name

tab_infos.Name: firstname
tab_infos.Description: The user's first name

tab_infos.Name: email
tab_infos.Description: The user's email

tab_infos.Name: status
tab_infos.Description: The user's status

tab_infos.Name: birthday
tab_infos.Description: The user's birthday

tab_infos.Name: inscription_date
tab_infos.Description: The user's inscription date

tab_infos.Name: gender
tab_infos.Description: The user's gender : F or M

tab_infos.Name: link
tab_infos.Description: The url of the profil for the user on Deezer

tab_infos.Name: picture
tab_infos.Description: The url of the user's profil picture. Add 'size' parameter to the url to change size. Can be 'small', 'medium', 'big', 'xl'

tab_infos.Name: picture_small
tab_infos.Description: The url of the user's profil picture in size small.

tab_infos.Name: picture_medium
tab_infos.Description: The url of the user's profil picture in size medium.

tab_infos.Name: picture_big
tab_infos.Description: The url of the user's profil picture in size big.

tab_infos.Name: picture_xl
tab_infos.Description: The url of the user's profil picture in size xl.

tab_infos.Name: country
tab_infos.Description: The user's country

tab_infos.Name: lang
tab_infos.Description: The user's language

tab_infos.Name: is_kid
tab_infos.Description: If the user is a kid or not

tab_infos.Name: explicit_content_level
tab_infos.Description: The user's explicit content level according to his country

tab_infos.Name: explicit_content_levels_available
tab_infos.Description: The user's available explicit content levels according to his country. Possible values are: explicit_display, explicit_no_recommendation and explicit_hide

tab_infos.Name: tracklist
tab_infos.Description: API Link to the flow of this user

tab_connections.Name: user / albums
tab_connections.Description: Return a list of user's favorite albums. Represented by an array of Album object
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type album

tab_connections.Name: user / artists
tab_connections.Description: Return a list of user's favorite artists. Represented by an array of Artist object
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type artist

tab_connections.Name: user / flow
tab_connections.Description: Returns a list of user's flow tracks, represented by an array of Track object.
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type track

tab_connections.Name: user / followings
tab_connections.Description: Return a list of user's Friends, represented by an array of User object
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type user

tab_connections.Name: user / followers
tab_connections.Description: Return a list of user's Friends, represented by an array of User object
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type user

tab_connections.Name: user / history
tab_connections.Description: Returns a list of the recently played tracks
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type track

tab_connections.Name: user / notifications
tab_connections.Description: Use this method in post only, to add notifications in user feed

tab_connections.Name: user / permissions
tab_connections.Description: Return the user's Permissions granted to the application

tab_connections.Name: user / personal_songs
tab_connections.Description: Return a list of user's personnal song, represented by an array of Tracks
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type track

tab_connections.Name: user / playlists
tab_connections.Description: Return a list of user's public Playlist, represented by an array of Playlist object.Permission is needed to return private playlists
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type playlist

tab_connections.Name: user / podcasts
tab_connections.Description: Return a list of user's favorite podcasts. Represented by an array of Podcast object
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type podcast

tab_connections.Name: user / radios
tab_connections.Description: Return a list of user's favorite Radios, represented by an array of Radio object.
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type radio

tab_connections.Name: user / recommendations
tab_connections.Description: Use recommendations/albums, recommendations/artists, recommendations/playlists, recommendations/tracks, recommendations/radios or recommendations/releases.

tab_connections.Name: user / tracks
tab_connections.Description: Return a list of user's favorite tracks. Represented by an array of Track object
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type track
